intro: Here goes your questions, Mayavi, for the Machine Learning Intern role (2 questions, Medium difficulty).
questions: 1. Let's say you are building a fraud detection system for an e-commerce platform. The dataset is highly imbalanced, with fraudulent transactions representing only 0.1% of the total data. Describe how you would approach this problem, including specific techniques you would use to address the class imbalance and evaluate the performance of your model.

2. Imagine you've trained a deep learning model for image classification and are consistently getting high accuracy on your training set but significantly lower accuracy on your validation set. What are three distinct strategies you could implement to address this issue and improve the model's generalization performance? Explain the reasoning behind each strategy.
